name: Where is my Sun?
description:
It's been 59 days since the sun disappeared. 

Amidst the freezing demise of the world, a mother scours to find and reunite with her missing son before it all ends.

_______________________________

CONTROLS: 

[arrow keys] = move

[z] = interact with things

_______________________________

Many thanks to Michael Iantorno, Alex Custodio, and the Solar Game Jam.

Created at the Technoculture, Art and Games (TAG) at Milieux Institute, Concordia University. 

Produced by Richy Srirachanikorn.
